com.toxi.net

Interface ClientListener


  • public interface ClientListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleError(java.lang.Exception e)
      Callback to give the client a chance to react to the encountered exception.
      void notifyConnected()
      Callback to confirm client has successfully connected
      void notifyDisconnected()
      Callback to notify client has disconnected from the server.
      void triggerFrame()
      Callback to trigger the rendering of a new frame.
      void triggerUpdate()
      Callback to trigger an update of the server managed process.

    • Method Detail

      • triggerUpdate

        void triggerUpdate()
        Callback to trigger an update of the server managed process. This might be called several times in a row if the client has fallen behind in time. There should be NO rendering related tasks being called from this callback.

      • triggerFrame

        void triggerFrame()
        Callback to trigger the rendering of a new frame. This method will ALWAYS be called after {triggerUpdate() and should be purely focused on drawing/rendering specific tasks, but no CPU intensive model updates.

      • notifyConnected

        void notifyConnected()
        Callback to confirm client has successfully connected

      • notifyDisconnected

        void notifyDisconnected()
        Callback to notify client has disconnected from the server.

      • handleError

        void handleError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Callback to give the client a chance to react to the encountered exception.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception which caused the callback
